title: Shania Twain: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The star has a candid conversation about her career and her book.
itunes:summary: Best-selling author and award-winning country-pop star Shania Twain discusses her memoir, "From This Moment On," an in-depth look at her challenging childhood and her rise to worldwide fame.
